attributes.action: Give Dennis devier 84yr old war veteran his desperatly needed NHS eye treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mr devier is fighting to get NHS treatment to stop him going blind. This man fought for us in WW11 so that we could have the lives that we take for granted today. He cares for his disabled wife also.This man has earned the right for this treatment 10 fold without men and women like him we wouldnt have a NHS system.he has already spent his savings of £8000 on private care as the NHS is failing him remember he didnt fail us!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
